text: Sylvain Matrisciano (born 6 July 1963) is a retired French football goalkeeper and later manager.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:French footballers Category:Racing Besançon players Category:Lille OSC players Category:AS Nancy players Category:Valenciennes FC players Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Ligue 1 players Category:French football managers Category:Racing Besançon managers Category:Stade Brestois 29 managers
title: Sylvain Matrisciano
